snippet: The report signals the fifth consecutive quarter of decline in operating profit and reflects continuing troubles for the company’s mobile division.
abstract: Samsung reports expected operating profit of around 5.2 trillion won, or $4.7 billion, in quarter ending December 2014, down 37 percent from 8.3 trillion won year earlier; sales totaled around 52 trillion won, down about 12 percent from 59.3 trillion year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The report signals the fifth consecutive quarter of decline in operating profit and reflects continuing troubles for the company’s mobile division.

headline.main: Samsung Predicts Big Drop in Its End-of-Year Quarter
headline.print_headline: Samsung Predicts Big Drop in Its End-of-Year Quarter
